Faunapedia.FaunaFilterDef.label: Trainability: None
Faunapedia.FaunaFilterDef.description: Show only animals which have no/minimal training capability.

Faunapedia.FaunaFilterDef.label: Trainability: Intermediate
Faunapedia.FaunaFilterDef.description: Show only animals which have intermediate training capability.

Faunapedia.FaunaFilterDef.label: Trainability: Advanced
Faunapedia.FaunaFilterDef.description: Show only animals which have advanced training capability.
